text: Brovello-Carpugnino is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Verbano- Cusio-Ossola in the Italian region of Piedmont. It’s approximately 100 kilometers (62 miles) northeast of Turin and about 14 kilometers (9 miles) southwest of Verbania. As of December 2004, Brovello-Carpugnino had a population of 607 residents and covers an area of 8.3 square kilometers (3.2 square miles). The people of Brovello-Carpugnino are known as “Brovellesi.” == References == Category:Settlements in Verbano-Cusio-Ossola
title: Brovello-Carpugnino
